with pH value 5.0 to 8.0', 'üíß Moisture booster chemical bags provided for low earth resistance' ] }, { id: 4, name: 'NE Copper Bonded Earthing Electrode', category: 'Earthing Solutions', price: corrosion protection', '‚ö° Designed for fast fault current dissipation ensuring safety', 'üîß Low maintenance for hassle-free performance', '‚è≥ Easy & fast installation for quick setup on-site', 'üåç Ideal for soil conditions with pH value between 5.0 to 8.0', 'üíß Moisture booster chemical bags provided for low earth resistance' ] }, { id: 6, name: 'Earthing Pit Cover', category: 'Earthing Accessories', price: 'Contact Us', image: '/products/product6.png', description: 'Heavy-duty polyethylene earthing pit cover with factory-built holes for easy access.', rating: 4.6, reviews: 89, inStock: true, icon: CheckCircle, color: 'from-indigo-500 to-blue-500', specifications: [ { spec: 'At Top', details: '10 inches (254mm)' }, { spec: 'At Bottom', details: '13 inches (330mm)' }, { spec: 'Height', details: '10.25 inches (260mm)' } ], features: [ 'üõ†Ô∏è Factory-built holes for easy access to strips/wires on both sides', 'üèóÔ∏è Made of heavy-duty polyethylene for extra durability',
